title: ArteryMessageLoggingSpec: Message logging must not be on if debug logging not enabled

labels.name: failed
labels.description: Tickets that indicate a CI failure, likely a flakey test

body:
https://jenkins.akka.io:8498/job/akka-artery-tcp-remote-tests/38/consoleFull

'Connection refused' seems suspicious here?

